short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generate, review, and edit LinkedIn comments without needing to copy-paste or switch tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✨ Select from variety of comment styles
With just one click, Impressify will generate a tailored comment suggestion based on your chosen style.
